title: Smoke-free policy cuts nicotine detected in Philadelphia public housing in half

title_detail.value: Smoke-free policy cuts nicotine detected in Philadelphia public housing in half

summary: The largest public housing authority to implement comprehensive smoke-free policies, the Philadelphia Housing Authority, is seeing significant positive results related to secondhand smoke exposures.

summary_detail.value: The largest public housing authority to implement comprehensive smoke-free policies, the Philadelphia Housing Authority, is seeing significant positive results related to secondhand smoke exposures.
